casebody.data:
Ren JUDKINS, Plaintiff-Cross Appellant, v. HT WINDOW FASHIONS CORP., Defendant-Appellant. Nos. 2010-1336, 2010-1356. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 6, 2011. Frederick L. Whitmer, Kilpatrick Stockton, LLP, of New York, NY, argued for plaintiff-cross appellant. Of counsel on the brief were Lynn J. Alstadt and Ralph G. Fischer, Buchanan Ingersoll & Rooney, PC, of Pittsburgh, PA. Arne M. Olson, Olson & Cepuritis, Ltd., of Chicago, IL, argued for defendant-appellant. With him on the brief were David I. Roche, Baker & McKenzie, LLP, of Chicago, IL. Of counsel on the brief were Joseph M. Kuo and Matthew D. Kellam, Olson & Cepuritis, Ltd., of Chicago, IL.

GAJARSA, MAYER, and O’Malley, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

THIS CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

*904Ordered and Adjudged:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
